text: Yithi: “Yizani namangqina enu ngaphambili, ngubani onganika ubungqina bokuba uAllâh Akakuvumelanga oku? Ukuba ke bayabunika ubungqina (obo), ungangqini nabo wena (Muhammad). Ungalandeli iminqweno yabo yamampunge abo bathabatha iiVesi zethu njengobuxoki bengakholwa nokukholwa kuBomi oBuzayo, bona bathabatha abanye (bathi) bayalingana neNkosi yabo
